text: San'nan kuma zukatanku, suka ƙeƙashe daga bayan wancan. Saboda haka suka zamanto kamar duwatsu. Ko mafi tsananin ƙeƙashewa. kuma lalle ne daga duwatsu, haƙika, akwai abin da maremari suke ɓuɓɓuga daga gare shi, kuma lalle ne daga gare su, haƙiƙa, akwai abin da yake tsatstsagewa har ruwa ya fita daga gare shi, kuma lalle ne, haƙiƙa, daga gare su, haƙiƙa, akwai da yake faɗowa domin tsoron Allah, kuma Allah bai zama gafili ba daga barin abin da kuke aikatawa
